version_description:
Fixed as follows.

- Fix app crash when select twitter tab.
- Add function to select notification sound for intensity "4 and less" and "5 lower and above".
- Add function to select intensity color original or JMA (JMA color pattern has been selected in consideration of colorblind person).
- Add link JMA web site in earthquake list.

Fixed as follows.
- They fixed the defect in which applications crashed at the first time.
- Specifications of saving setting.

Addition of the notice regarding service termination of Add-on.

[Important notice regarding service termination of Add-on]
Thank you for using Yurekuru Call. We would like to anounce that we decided to terminate our service for Add-on of Yurekuru Call on October 31 in 2016. For more information, please visit our web site (http://www.rcsc.co.jp/#!yurekuruen/crx3).

Note: You can continue to use free service of Yurekuru Call.

Thank you for using Yurekuru Call.
We began offering premium plan of Yurekuru Call.

◆ To the person who purchased add-on (Multiple Location Setting or Hide Ads) in iOS
If you have been previously purchased an add-on, automatically switches to the premium plan by updating to ver. 3.3.0.
Until November 30, 2016, offers the premium plan for free.
At premium plan purchase screen, please select "restore" and enter the ID.
Premium plan is canceled past the above-mentioned period, it will switch to the free version.
Unless you purchase a premium plan, you will not incur any charges.

NOTE: Yurekuru Call continue to be available in the basic free of charge.

Thank you for using Yurekuru Call.
We began offering premium plan of Yurekuru Call.
Below are the details of the revision.
- Bug fixes of the premium plan
- Bug fix of EEW Notification settings
- Change of design of the safety confirmation screen

NOTE: Yurekuru Call continue to be available in the basic free of charge.

Fix position of the shaking experience post screen.

◆ To the person who purchased add-on (Multiple Location Setting or Hide Ads) in iOS
If you have been previously purchased an add-on, automatically switches to the premium plan by updating to ver. 3.3.
Until November 30, 2016, offers the premium plan for free.
At premium plan purchase screen, please select "restore" and enter the ID.
Premium plan is canceled past the above-mentioned period, it will switch to the free version.
Unless you purchase a premium plan, you will not incur any charges.

NOTE: If you have purchased premium plan during this period, after a free trial period of one month from the date of purchase, please note that charges from next month will occur.

NOTE: Yurekuru Call continue to be available in the basic free of charge.

Thank you for using Yurekuru Call

- Fixed an issue that resetting other settings when setting a location using GPS.
- Fixed an issue that dialog is not displayed when launching from push notification on iOS 10.
- Fixed other minor issues.

累計600万ダウンロードアプリのゆれくるコールが、総合防災アプリ  PREP（プレップ） にリニューアルしました。

PREPをご利用いただきありがとうございます。
ゆれくるコールからのアップデート後にプレミアムプランのリストアができない不具合に対応しました。
ご利用のみなさまにご迷惑をおかけいたしましたことお詫び申し上げます。

引き続きPREPをよろしくお願いします。

PREPをご利用いただきありがとうございます。
4.0.2では軽微な機能の修正を行いました。

引き続きPREPをよろしくお願いします。

PREP is currently available in Japanese only. If you have Yurekuru Call and prefer English, we recommend keeping your current version.
Thank you for your patience and we are working hard to support English as soon as possible.

PREPをご利用いただきありがとうございます。
4.0.3では以下の修正を行いました。

・ゆれくるコールからのアップデート時に一部機能が正しく表示されない
・トップ（ライブ）画面の現在地名が一部正しく表示されない
・その他軽微な改修

現在、特定の状況においてアプリが操作不能になる、エラーが頻繁に発生する、通知や表示が不安定になるなどの不具合が発生しております。
ご迷惑をおかけして大変申し訳ございません。
速やかに改善できるよう対応中ですので、公式サイトやSNS、本ページで順次、対応状況をお知らせいたします。

引き続きPREPをよろしくお願いします。

PREP is currently available in Japanese only. If you have Yurekuru Call and prefer English, we recommend keeping your current version.
Thank you for your patience and we are working hard to support English as soon as possible.

PREPをご利用いただきありがとうございます。

・その他軽微な改修
